src:
AC Milan Vs Lazio, Biancocelesti Pantas Menang
04 Nov 2019, 10:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lazio sukses meraih kemenangan di markas AC Milan. Simone Inzaghi merasa kemenangan ini sepantasnya dipetik Lazio.
Lazio menantang Milan dalam pertandingan pekan ke-11 Serie A, Senin (4/11/19) dini hari WIB. Laga ini berakhir kemenangan untuk tim tamu dengan skor 2-1.
I Biancocelesti bisa unggul lebih dulu melalui Ciro Immobile di menit 25. Milan kemudian membalas berkat gol bunuh diri Bastos.
Gawang Milan kembali jebol saat pertandingan memasuki menit ke-83. Joaquin Correa berhasil mengubah kedudukan timnya menjadi 2-1.
text:
AC Milan vs Lazio, Biancocelesti Worth Winning
Nov 04 2019, 10:48 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Lazio successfully won at AC Milan headquarters. Simone Inzaghi feels this victory should be picked by Lazio.
Lazio challenged Milan in matchday 11 of Serie A on Monday (11/4/19) early morning hrs. This match ended victory for the visitors with a score of 2-1.
I Biancocelesti was able to take the lead through Ciro Immobile in the 25th minute. Milan then responded thanks to an own goal from Bastos.
Milan goalkeeper collapsed when the game entered the 83rd minute. Joaquin Correa managed to change the position of his team to 2-1.
